mapper.select: SELECT STD_CODE AS VALUE, STD_NM AS NAME FROM PUBLIC.tbl_std_cde WHERE std_grp = #{codeId} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY STD_CODE
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROLE_ID AS VALUE ,ROLE_NAM AS NAME FROM TGIS.SYS_ROLE_MNG WHERE ROLE_ID LIKE 'R%' ORDER BY ROLE_ID ) A ORDER BY VALUE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(cast(emd_cd as char(20)), 6, 3) AS VALUE, emd_kor_nm as NAME FROM tl_scco_emd WHERE emd_kor_nm IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(cast(emd_cd as char(20)), 1, 5) = #{sggCode} GROUP BY SUBSTR(cast(emd_cd as char(20)), 6, 3), NAME)TEMP ORDER BY NAME
